name: OUT OF THE WOODS (MONSTER MEOW STUDIOS)
name_original: OUT OF THE WOODS (MONSTER MEOW STUDIOS)
description:
WELCOME

A bear has gotten himself lost in the woods!

He is quite forgetful and has a terrible sense of direction. 

Thats where you come in! Guide this bear back to his home safely.

Use the 'ARROW KEYS' or 'A,W,D,S' to guide the bear out. 

However, you must remember to get the bear out as quicky as you can before the timer goes out. Collect the 'CLOCKS' to give you more time to escape the woods. 

BEWARE OF THE BEES! They will attack the bear when they spot him, you have 4 lives, collect the 'HONEY POTS' to gain back a lost life. 

There are 5 levels in total, to reach the next levels you need to pass through a large broken oak tree. 

Apart from that GOOD LUCK!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
